00030         typedef struct _OMax_build 
00031         {
00032                 t_object        ob;                     
00033                 
00034                 t_symbol*       oname;          
00035                 t_symbol*       odataname;      
00036                 O_data*         odata;          
00037                 bool            odatabound;     
00038                 t_symbol*       idataname;      
00039                 O_data*         idata;          
00040                 bool            idatabound;     
00041                 O_DataType      datatype;

00044                 t_atom*         addout;

00047                 void*           out_added;      
00048                 void*           out_date;       
00049         } t_OMax_build;

00077         int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00078         {       
00079                 t_class *c;
00080                 
00081                 c = class_new("OMax.build", (method)OMax_build_new, (method)OMax_build_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_build), 
00082                                           0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00083                 
00084                 // assistance
00085                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_build_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00086                 
00087                 // input methods
00088                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_build_bang, "bang", 0);
00089                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_build_add, "int", A_LONG, 0);
00090                 
00091                 class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00092                 OMax_build_class = c;
00093                 
00094                 return 0;
00095         }

00102         void *OMax_build_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00103         {
00104                 t_OMax_build *x = NULL;
00105                 
00106                 if (x = (t_OMax_build *)object_alloc(OMax_build_class))
00107                 {
00108                         // allocation
00109                         char err;
00110                         long i;
00111                         atom_alloc_array(2,&i,&(x->addout),&err);
00112                         if (!err && i!=2)
00113                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "Allocation error");
00114                         
00115                         // oulets
00116                         x->out_date = intout(x);
00117                         x->out_state = intout(x);
00118                         x->out_added = listout(x);
00119                         
00121                         x->odatabound = FALSE;
00122                         x->idatabound = FALSE;
00123             x->oname = NULL;
00124                         if (argc < 2)
00125                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Missing arguments (oracle's data & new sequence's data)");
00126                         else
00127                         {
00128                                 if (argv->a_type!=A_SYM && (argv+1)->a_type!=A_SYM)
00129                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Both arguments must be symbols (oracle's data & new sequence's data)");
00130                                 else
00131                                 {
00132                                         x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00133                                         x->odataname = OMax_build_dataname(x->oname);
00134                                         x->idataname = OMax_build_dataname(atom_getsym(argv+1));
00135                                 }
00136                                 
00137                         }
00138                         
00139                         // color
00140                         t_object *box;
00141                         t_jrgba colorvals;
00142                         jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00143                         object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00144                         jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);
00145                 }
00146                 return (x);
00147         }

00152         {
00153                 ;
00154         }
00155         
00158         void OMax_build_assist(t_OMax_build *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00159         {
00160                 switch (io)
00161                 {
00162             case 1: // inlets
00163                                 switch (index)
00164                         {
00165                                 case 0: // leftmost
00166                                         sprintf(s, "int state to add");
00167                                         break;
00168                         }
00169                 break;
00170                         case 2: // outlets
00171                                 switch (index)
00172                         {
00173                                 case 0: // leftmost
00174                                         sprintf(s, "added");
00175                                         break;
00176                                 case 1:
00177                                         sprintf(s, "size");
00178                                         break;
00179                                 case 2:
00180                                         sprintf(s, "ending date");
00181                                         break;
00182                         }
00183                 }
00184         }

00193         t_symbol * OMax_build_dataname(t_symbol * name)
00194         {
00195                 char dataname[128];
00196                 strcpy(dataname,name->s_name);
00198                 strcat(dataname,"_data");
00199                 return gensym(dataname);
00200         }
00201         
00204         bool OMax_build_bind(t_OMax_build *x)
00205         {
00207                 if ((x->odatabound==FALSE) || (x->idatabound==FALSE))
00208                 {
00209             if (x->oname != NULL)
00210                         {
00212                 if ((x->odataname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->odataname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.data")))
00213                 {
00214                     x->odata = &(((t_OMax_data*)(x->odataname->s_thing))->data);
00215                     x->odatabound = TRUE;
00216                     object_post((t_object *)x,"Builder bound to Data of Oracle %s", x->oname->s_name);
00217                 }
00218                 else
00219                 {
00220                     object_error((t_object *)x,"No data for Oracle %s declared", x->oname->s_name);
00221                 }
00223                 if ((x->idataname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->idataname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.data")))
00224                 {
00225                     if (((t_OMax_data*)(x->idataname->s_thing))->datatype == ((t_OMax_data*)(x->odataname->s_thing))->datatype 
00226                         && ((t_OMax_data*)(x->idataname->s_thing))->noDelete == TRUE)
00227                     {
00228                         x->idata = &(((t_OMax_data*)(x->idataname->s_thing))->data);
00229                         x->idatabound = TRUE;
00230                         x->datatype = ((t_OMax_data*)(x->odataname->s_thing))->datatype;
00231                         object_post((t_object *)x,"Builder writing Sequence %s", x->idataname->s_name);
00232                     }
00233                     else
00234                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Data type mismatch");
00235                 }
00236                 else
00237                     object_error((t_object *)x,"No new data declared to write");
00238                         }
00239                         else
00240                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Missing arguments (oracle's data & new sequence's data)");
00241                 }
00244                 return (x->odatabound && x->idatabound);
00245         }

00251         
00255         void OMax_build_bang(t_OMax_build *x)
00256         {
00257                 if (OMax_build_bind(x)&&(x->odataname->s_thing)&&(x->idataname->s_thing))
00258                 {
00259                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00260                         if(!(((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag))
00261                         {
00262                                 if(x->idata->get_size()<=1)
00263                                         x->date = 0;
00264                                 outlet_int(x->out_date, x->date);
00265                                 outlet_int(x->out_state, (long)x->idata->get_size());
00266                         }
00267                         else
00268                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "Data busy");
00269                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00270                 }
00271         }
00272         
00276         void OMax_build_add(t_OMax_build *x, long statein)
00277         {
00278                 if (OMax_build_bind(x)&&(x->odataname->s_thing)&&(x->idataname->s_thing))
00279                 {
00280                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->odataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00281                         if(!(((t_OMax_data *)(x->odataname->s_thing))->wflag)
00282                            && !(((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag)
00283                            && !(((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->readcount))
00284                         {
00285                                 
00286                                 if((*x->odata)[statein]!=NULL)
00287                                 {
00288                                         int statnb;
00289                                         if(x->idata->get_size()<=1)
00290                                                 x->date = 0;
00292                                         switch (x->datatype)
00293                                         {
00294                                                 case LETTERS:
00295                                                 {
00296                                                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00297                                                         statnb = x->idata->add<O_char>(x->date,(*x->odata)[statein]);
00298                                                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00299                                                         break;
00300                                                 }
00301                                                 case MIDI_MONO:
00302                                                 {
00303                                                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00304                                                         statnb = x->idata->add<O_MIDI_mono>(x->date,(*x->odata)[statein]);
00305                                                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00306                                                         break;
00307                                                 }
00308                                                 case SPECTRAL:
00309                                                 {
00310                                                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00311                                                         statnb = x->idata->add<O_spectral>(x->date,(*x->odata)[statein]);
00312                                                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00313                                                         break;
00314                                                 }
00315                                                 case MIDI_POLY:
00316                                                 {
00317                                                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00318                                                         statnb = x->idata->add<O_MIDI_poly>(x->date,(*x->odata)[statein]);
00319                                                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->wflag);
00320                                                         break;
00321                                                 }
00322                                         }
00323                                         
00325                                         x->date = (x->date + (*x->odata)[statein]->get_duration());
00326                                         outlet_int(x->out_date, x->date);       
00327                                         outlet_int(x->out_state, (long)x->idata->get_size()); 
00328                                         
00329                                         t_atom_long added[2];
00330                                         added[0] = statnb;
00331                                         added[1] = statein;
00332                                         atom_setlong_array(2,x->addout,2,added);
00333                                         outlet_list(x->out_added, NULL, 2, x->addout); 
00334                                 }
00335                         }
00336                         else
00337                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "Data of Oracle %s being read (%d)",x->idataname->s_name,((t_OMax_data *)(x->idataname->s_thing))->readcount);
00338                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->odataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00339                 }
00340         }
00341         
00343 }
